dtliExcerpt: Strong's performance is commanding and charismatic, even when his character is at his most insufferable. He captures both Stockmann's genuine idealism and his stubborn self-righteousness.

nycTheatreExcerpt: It's far from the first time Ibsen  and this work in particular  has been dragged into the present, but it's urgent and effective. Ultimately one of the key strengths of this bracing revival is that it presents a classic drama as a play for our time.
